original_title: アンジュルム DVD Magazine Vol.4
overview: This DVD magazine features close coverage of the ANGERME First Concert Tour 2015 Aki "Hyakka Ryouran", including behind of the scenes footage from Fukuda Kanon's graduation special.  It was released on March 5, 2016 at merchandise for the ANGERME Live Tour 2016 Haru "Kyuui Ittai".
title: ANGERME DVD Magazine Vol.4
